items.sentence: Tom had the time of his life at the party last night.
Tom choked back tears as he gave his mother's eulogy.
Tom was rushed to a hospital in a critical condition.
Tom couldn't bring himself to break it off with Mary.
Tom's parents never told him about the facts of life.
Tom didn't succeed, but it wasn't for want of trying.
Tom doesn't wash his hair every time he takes a bath.
Tom had been sick for three weeks when I visited him.
Think, everyone! Where haven't we looked for Tom yet?
Tom will be watching television if you visit him now.
